name: Duel Wield
description:
Another prototype project I created while teaching myself some coding. With this one I wanted to produce a top down shooter with a unique twist. Your Character has two guns which can aim in different directions. It is a very simple game with deadly boxes coming to attack you. Just a little warning. The music is very loud!

I have unfortunately lost the Unity Project for this game so further development for this game is unlikely. This also means I am unable to fix the unfortunate spelling errors in the game. However please feel free to leave comments with criticism if you would like to see me return to this.

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
